text: @CashApp Due to Covid19 I'm stuck in the house. No this isn't a scam. Yes this is really me. No I don't have any money 😭 I just wanna get pizza sodas and a pack of smokes. This economic impact payment is taking way too long to get here and my unemployment hasn't started yet $DJDannieG215
